definition: a pitcher who does not start the game
details:
noun
- a pitcher who does not start the game
= synonyms: fireman
- a person who reduces the intensity (e.g., of fears) and calms and pacifies
= example: a person who reduces the intensity (e.g., of fears) and calms and pacifies
= synonyms: comforter
- someone who takes the place of another (as when things get dangerous or difficult)
= synonyms: stand-in, backup man, fill-in, relief, substitute, backup
